items.name: Tristán Narvaja
items.description: Every Sunday from early morning until three in the afternoon enjoy the biggest market in Montevideo.

items.name: Rambla Montevideo
items.description: 22 kilometers long avenue along the coast of Rio de la Plata stretching throughout all of Montevideo.

items.name: Legislative Palace Bistro
items.description: It's warm and relaxed atmosphere, making it a favorite haunt for tourists, businessmen and cultural figures.

items.name: Colonia
items.description: Cobbled and irregular streets straight from history, and a unique landscape with spectacular view of the river.

items.name: Casapueblo
items.description: Casapueblo is the former summer home of Uruguayan artist Carlos Paez Vilaró and is now an art gallery, museum and hotel
